ygData.subject: Re: VariousTopics
ygData.msgSnippet: Money IS a real problem !! I am being driven NUTS by groups declaring they will loot Alpha 4P or FS, autosplit OFF ... Then watch while the looter carefully
ygData.messageBody:
Money IS a real problem !! I am being driven NUTS by groups declaring
they will loot "Alpha 4P or FS, autosplit OFF"... Then watch while the
looter carefully avoids looting anything with a weapon till last and
then they declare "Nuts, all silver and a rusty" :( ...of course an
hour later your up for loot and the leader (Named Alphonse of course)
declares "I gotta go guys, great playing with you" and disbands the
group.
Now I don't want to be a spoil sport but central loot collection and
no split schemes seem to me to have too many bugs to allow to be used in
groups I am in. If you need money my opinion is "Alpha auto on" is the
only way to go !!
Moonflower Bllue, Cazic-Thule

PS. I am in debt to a guild member up to 150p. Guilds help but this is
"business" not family :)
Any great money making schemes appreciated :)

> The gems for these pieces plus guantlets
> has cost me 1000pp. Then it was time to kill more HG's for money as well as
> lambents, I was down to only a few gold in the bank! This leaves no room to
> pay for the lambent. Being guilded really helps though, just put out the
> call for an HG expedition and I had a mid 30s to 40s crew in route
> immediately for a profitable night.
